member.name: M:UncompromisingFires.UncompromisingFires.GetGUIDrynessLabel
member.summary: For UI modders who want to add support for this mod.
member.returns: Returns a string containing the map's "dryness" for display in the Weather GUI. e.g. "Humid", "Fair", "Dry", "100%"

member.name: M:UncompromisingFires.UncompromisingFires.GetGUITooltipLabel
member.summary: For UI modders who want to add support for this mod.
member.returns: Returns a string containing extended tooltip information, for display in the Weather GUI's tooltip. e.g. "Current dryness, Increase per day, Days since last rain, Days average until rain"
